paragraphs.body: This is the page where formal requests for rollback rights can be filed. Rollback rights enable normal users to use a [rollback] button to quickly revert vandalism from diff pages. It is particularly useful on Avatar Wiki when an admin is unavailable to take bigger action against vandals. The ability to delete article and blog comments is also included. There is no maximum number of rollback users, so if you believe you deserve rollback rights, please do not hesitate to make a request.

There is no maximum number of rollback users, so if you believe you deserve rollback rights, please do not hesitate to make a request.

paragraphs.body: Greetings! I, Felix Fellicis, am requesting rollback rights on Avatar Wiki. Although I did take a rather long break from the wiki (more than a year), I am back and I  am here to stay (at least for some time), as I find working and editing on the Avatar Wiki to be a fun little side activity, which helps me get through University (especially now, that exams are closing in...). I have several ideas, which I would like to present and work on and hope that they'll be accepted. Also, I would like to immerse myself in anti-vandalism and general editing. Thank you in advance, regardless of the outcome! Felix Fellicis (talk) 21:42, April 16, 2018 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: I, HammerOfThor, am requesting rollback rights on Avatar Wiki. I think I have demonstrated, across both my entire time on the wiki and more recently since I returned, a strong history of contributions to the wiki, a demonstrated history of correcting vandalism where it occurs, and an extensive understanding of the site's policies. I believe I conducted myself in the manner expected during my first time as a rollback, and I will continue to conduct myself in that same manner moving forward should I get these rights. HAMMEROFTHOR 18:29, November 8, 2018 (UTC)
